Reviews.Title: A solid buisness computer that is easy to custimize
Reviews.Author: Peter Shen
Reviews.Content: Pros:-Very easy service/ upgrading-Very stylish-Intel Wireless Chip (never have connectivity issues)-Matte Display-Works with E-port DockCons:- Hinge gets loose easily- Only comes with 2GB of RAM- Only comes with DVD-ROM drive not RW

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Thomas W.
Reviews.Content: My only complaint is that is should have been upgraded to 8GB or mememory.  Other than that it was a good deal.

Reviews.Title: motherboard fried after couple months of use
Reviews.Author: jim bean "jimmy bean"
Reviews.Content: The monitor was kind of dim at the start and after a few months it just fried its was a decent computer but now its a paper weight

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: María d.
Reviews.Content: I was happy with my product, it is working perfectly, battery life is not new but I can work an hour without the charger. I love my laptop!

Reviews.Title: Paid for 2 laptops with 4GB RAM each.But I got only 2 GB RAM on each m/c. Upon escalation, DataSales shipped remaining 4GB RAM
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: 1) 2 LAPTOPS PURCHASED WITH 4 GB RAM, BUT ONLY 2GB RAM DELIVERED ON EACH LAPTOP.Upon escalations, received the missing 4GB RAM after 8 days.2) ONE LAPTOP HAD BOTTOM COVER OPEN - I CLEARLY CAN SEE INTERNAL PARTS .. PHOTOS ALSO SENT TO SUPPLIER DATA SALES --But the Vendor DataSales response is: Fix-it-yourself.

Reviews.Title: Tampa Laptops is an outstanding company.
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: Several weeks ago I bought a refurbished Dell E6410 from Tampa Laptops. My objective was to buy an inexpensive machine running Windows 7 that would do a better job of running some of my more demanding tasks that were a burden on my older Vista machine. The Dell machine I received from Tampa Laptops did exactly that. It was fast, quiet and powerful. However, it did have one problem. It would crash about two times out of three on a shutdown or a reboot. Support at Tampa Laptops worked with me by phone and email for about a week to try to resolve the problem. Finally they decided to have me return it at their expense. They emailed a shipping label, so the process could not have been easier. They found a problem with the power board, so they sent me a second machine with my original disk with all its settings intact. The second machine is fine. It is clean, runs well, and the battery has lots of power. I highly recommend Tampa Laptops.
